(Public Company; 501-1000 employees; CKSG (Defunct); Marketing and Advertising industry)

Contributed to numerous internal white papers on subjects such as push technology, emerging browser technologies, measurement and tracking, etc.

Proven track record of integrating marketing strategies, creative concepts, and emerging technologies to develop world-class new media products and services. Major accomplishments include work for General Motors, Network Corporation, Microsoft, MCI, Prudential, UPS, Sony, Johnson & Johnson, NationsBank, NBC, Apple, US Robotics, Clinique and others.

Strategic Marketing: Developed research and designed strategic new media marketing programs to achieve client objectives. Extended brand strategies.

Business Development: Participated in strategic sales planning and activities. Presented strategic and technical capabilities of CKS|Interactive. Contributed all new-business proposals.

Research and Education: Surveyed new trends in net-based interactive marketing and strategic application of Internet technologies.
